Jake Paul has insisted that he's 'moving on' from Tommy Fury after their fight was thrown into doubt after the Brit was denied access into the United States.

articles.title: F1: Lando Norris reveals he receives death threats online and his girlfriend has 'hate pages' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Norris has become used to the spotlight with the youngster in his fourth season of F1 racing. His girlfriend has been thrown into the spotlight after their relationship became public.
articles.content:
British Formula One star Lando Norris has revealed how he regularly receives death threats on social media.
The 22-year-old McLaren driver, who is seventh in the drivers' championship, has also talk… [+4117 chars]
